title: Community Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University
Interview Descriptions: Very easy, just be yourself. They might take a while to get back to you so be patient. There usually is only one interview. About 8 questions. Should take around 30 minutes to complete
Interview Questions: What do you know about the position

title: Assistant Professor, Computer Science Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University in Nov 2022
Interview Descriptions: The first round of Interviews lasted 35 minutes with the search committee, followed by the second round of interviews spread across an approximately 3 hours block, including a teaching demonstration and research presentation.
Interview Questions: Questions about already completed research, leadership activities, etc.

title: Assistant Professor Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University
Interview Descriptions: Very professional. Called and were on time. Very interested in my perspective. Seemed to be interested in my line of study and my connection to students. I was told the timeline of the hiring process.
Interview Questions: Why did you apply to SFA?

title: Hall Director Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was fine. The department was very welcoming. The interview was a bit repetitive with questions but overall it was a nice process. The hiring process went fairly quickly.
Interview Questions: What experience did you have handling a large budget?

title: Graduate Teacher Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University
Interview Descriptions: Easy and friendly interview, no hard questions were asked by the interviewer. I found it very easy to speak with the interviewer. Comfortable and relaxed meeting. I was offered the job and accepted.
Interview Questions: What's one of your best strengths

title: Student Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University
Interview Descriptions: Amazing! Super easy and laid back. The interviewers just wanted to know me as a person and what I was willing to bring to the table. I would recommend working on campus to anyone.

title: Operations Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University (Nacogdoches, TX) in Feb 2018
Interview Descriptions: Sat with the team and discussed job responsibilities while discussing the ups and downs of the job. Staff was friendly and I appreciated their time. Ended up working here for 3 years while going to school
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here

title: AARC GA Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University (Nacogdoches, TX)
Interview Descriptions: Very simple and relaxing, management wants to get to know you. They want to know how you react to students who are under pressure and need scholarly advice to bring themselves back up with school.
Interview Questions: Do you work well with students?

title: Community Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: Optional introduction presentation, long online form, followed by in person interview with 2 Hall Directors asking a few questions. Bring a door dec and an example of an educational event you would host as a CA
Interview Questions: How have you encountered diversity in your life?

title: Student Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 6 months. I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University
Interview Descriptions: It was super laid back. All the guys are very laid back and nice. I honestly had the best boss ever.  The interview was very casual. They really just want to know that the applicant has people skills and has an actual interest in technology and a will to learn.
Interview Questions: What makes you want to go into IT?

title: VR Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University (Nacogdoches, TX) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: My interview process was pretty good, I was able to understand exactly where the interviewer was asking and where she/he were coming from. It was definitely a great experience for me asa college student.

title: Buyer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University (Nacogdoches, TX) in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: Sat down and was asked questions the state provides for an interview. There were several questions and it took about 30 minutes to answer. Then got a tour. Very cordial.

title: Student Assistant Residence Life Operations Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University
Interview Descriptions: I met with the supervisor of the specific department I applied for. We sat in his office for a few brief minutes while we hashed out what my schedule would be. Overall a very easy interview process.

title: Student Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University (Nacogdoches, TX) in May 2015
Interview Descriptions: The hiring process was simple. You just went online on sfasu.edu to apply to positions for students, and fill out the information within the application provided to you on the website. From there, if selected, you will be notified for an interview. You will set up a time, and then answer a few mandatory questions by the interviewer to see if you're right for the position.
Interview Questions: When are you available to work?

title: Student Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University (Nacogdoches, TX) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: Situational interview, relaxed interview, dress business casual, must have a good GPA, need to be available for the work hours they need to fill, no need for previous experience, must qualify for work-study grant
Interview Questions: Tell us an example of a time you had to show initiate.

title: Graduate Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University (Nacogdoches, TX) in Jul 2013
Interview Descriptions: Very laid back, with the usual questions in an interview. The ever so common "tell me about yourself" was asked and then they go through what you may be doing throughout your semester.
Interview Questions: Tell me what you expect to gain as a GA.

title: ACCESS SERVICES Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University (Nacogdoches, TX) in Mar 2012
Interview Descriptions: It was short, lasted about a week. First their was a phone screening, then we communicated through a series of emails. I met with the hiring lady once and was offered the job on the spot.

title: Assistant Hall Director Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Stephen F. Austin University (Nacogdoches, TX) in Apr 2011
Interview Descriptions: It was a good process throughout the entire process the interviewer was in good spirits. They were really cool and laid back. They made the candidate feel comfortable. The interview was more like a conversation. Overall it was a fair process for the student wanting to work and go to school.
